title: E3 Is Back! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.06.21
description: Gary and Greg talk about the ESA coming back with an all virtual #E32021 that's got the backing of #Xbox, #Nintendo, and more. Also, Gary blames IGN's Rebekah Valentine for ruining his daughter's life. (Kinda.)
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
